A NUMBER of national newspapers have described Barrow as being in 'one of the most remote parts of the UK'.
The Guardian published an article which claimed the high infection numbers are 'despite having fewer visitors than the nearby Lake District'.

articles.title: Coronavirus: 'Last thing Wales needs is face mask shaming', says top official - BBC News
articles.description: Top official explains why Wales is not recommending face coverings, unlike other UK nations.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
The last thing Wales needs is a culture of people being "shamed" because they are not wearing masks, the country's chief medical officer Frank Atherton has said.

articles.title: Online calculator shows how likely you are to die from Covid-19 - Bristol Live
articles.description: It uses age, gender, underlying health and other factors to show how dangerous coronavirus is for you
articles.content:
UK scientists have created an online calculator that shows how likely you are to die if you contract the new coronavirus disease Covid-19.
